title: My Gboard sync is showing January 2 1970. How can this happen? Pixel 2 on Android 10.
content: I have rebooted numerous times, to no avail. With each day change, the Gboard sync moves up one day. The time is approx 6 hours behind current time. Each time I sync, it moves forward. Anybody got any ideas? Otherwise, the phone works flawlessly!
